level.text: When used in this chapter, the following terms and phrases shall have the meanings ascribed:
Complete complaint – a signed complaint, together with all the other necessary documents and agreements as defined in §§1402.2 and 1402.8.
Panel – one or more arbitrators selected to hear consumer claims pursuant to D.C. Law 5-162.
Respondent – any manufacturer, its dealer, or agent, or provider of any good or service that is subject to a claim filed under the Act.
